Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.instil.lgi

Interface Summary
GrammarUtility This interface is used to define post parsing optimizations on a parsed tree.
MethodFinder This is a utility interface used during execution of a Block whose operator represents a Class method.
 

Class Summary
BinaryOperatorParser This class comprises the parsing of a binary operator Block into a tree of Blocks where each one is a function (method) call and the precedence in the operators is represented by a tree structure.
Block Basic node of a parsed tree.
NullUtility Null implementation of a GrammarUtility.
PackratParser This class comprises the parsing of Strings into Block trees.
ParseError This class represents the occurrence of a parsing error.
ParserTester This is a utility class, used to do a quick test for a grammar specification and parsing of a String.
ParsingExpressionGrammar This class is the hand-parsed tree of the Parsing Expression Grammar specification (PEG.txt) found in the examples directory of this distribution.
ParsingGrammar This class contains all the information related to a generated grammar.
PEGUtility This is a GrammarUtility implementation used by the ParsingExpressionGrammar to optimize the parsed trees and parse errors generated by it.
TreeOptimizer This is a utility class that defines the most usual operations performed by a GrammarUtility.
 

Exception Summary
GrammarFormatException This class is a simple extension of a RuntimeException to flag format exceptions in a Grammar description.
